AliasGroup.name: First Target
AliasGroup.script:
--syntax: tgt OR tgt xxx local colors = { dark = "ansi_red", light = "ansi_cyan", trolloc = "ansi_red", myrddraal = "ansi_red", dreadlord = "ansi_red", greyman = "ansi_red", draghkar = "ansi_red", human = "ansi_cyan", seanchan = "ansi_magenta", ogier = "ansi_green", aiel = "ansi_white" }
targeting = targeting or {}
if matches[3] then targeting.first = matches[4] if colors[targeting.first] then cecho("First target is set as: <" .. colors[targeting.first] .. ">" .. targeting.first .. "<reset>.
") else cecho("First target is set as: <gold>" .. targeting.first .. "<reset>.
") end elseif targeting.first then if colors[targeting.first] then cecho("First target is set as: <" .. colors[targeting.first] .. ">" .. targeting.first .. "<reset>.
") else cecho("First target is set as: <gold>" .. targeting.first .. "<reset>.
") end else cecho("<red>Target not set!
") end

Alias.name: Attack Target
Alias.script:
--syntax: p
targeting=targeting or {}
local target=targeting.first
if target then send("k "..target) else cecho("<red>Target not set!\n") end

Alias.name: Attack h.Target
Alias.script:
--syntax: o
targeting=targeting or {}
local target=targeting.first
if target then send("k h."..target) else cecho("<red>Target not set!\n") end

Alias.name: Bash Target
Alias.script:
--syntax: q

Alias.name: Backstab/Charge Target
Alias.script:
--syntax: ct OR ct xxx
targeting = targeting or {}
local target = targeting.first local stab = targeting.backstabbing local charge = targeting.charging
if matches[3] then if charge then send("charge h." .. matches[4]) elseif stab then send("backstab h." .. matches[4]) else cecho("<red>No pk method set\n") end else if target then if charge then send("charge h." .. target) elseif stab then send("backstab h." .. target) else cecho("<red>No pk method set\n") end else cecho("<red>Target not set!\n") end end

Alias.name: Delete Target
Switch PK Modes
Alias.script:
--syntax: pkmode
targeting=targeting or {}
local charge=targeting.charging local stab=targeting.backstabbing
if charge then targeting.charging=false targeting.backstabbing=true cecho("Set at pk method: <orange>Backstabbing\n") elseif stab then targeting.backstabbing=false cecho("<red>No pk method set\n") else targeting.charging=true cecho("Set at pk method: <green>Charge\n") end
